intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: As a Computer Engineer, I work in the fields of web development and software architecture. As a freelance web developer, I offer modern, user-friendly web solutions to clients. I have developed projects with React and JavaScript, and have experience in object-oriented programming with C# and Python. I am interested in backend development with technologies like Firebase. As a team-oriented and eager-to-learn developer, I continue to improve my technical skills with innovative projects.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: I develop modern, high-performance web applications with React.js, Next.js and TypeScript. I have experience in Redux, Context API, Hooks and component-based architecture. I create user-oriented interfaces with responsive design and modern UI/UX principles.

backend.title: Backend & Database
backend.description: I do backend development and API integrations with Node.js, Firebase and SQL databases. I have experience in RESTful API design, authentication systems and database management.

tools.title: Programming Languages & Tools
tools.description: I have software development experience in JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, C# and Java. I have practical knowledge in version control with Git/GitHub, modern development tools and agile methodologies.
